title: Power Stones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use one stone on someone to deal a Basic attack.
- Use two stones on someone to deal a Powerful attack.
- Use three stones on someone to deal an Unstoppable attack.
- Use four stones on someone to deal an Overkill attack.
- Use five stones on someone to deal an Overoverkill attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have five stones each night.
- You may use as many abilities as you like as long as you have enough stones.
